name: Massimo Bottura
description: Massimo Bottura is an Italian chef and restaurateur. He is the owner and chef of Osteria Francescana, a three-Michelin-star restaurant in Modena, Italy. He is known for his innovative and contemporary approach to Italian cuisine.

recipes.name: Tortellini in brodo
instructions: Heat beef broth in a pot
Cook tortellini pasta in broth until al dente
Add parmesan cheese, nutmeg, and black pepper to taste before serving
recipes.description: A traditional Italian pasta dish made with tortellini pasta in a warm beef broth.

recipes.name: Tagliatelle al ragù
instructions: Saute onion, carrot, and celery in olive oil
Add ground beef and cook until browned
Add tomato paste and red wine
Add beef broth and simmer for 2 hours
Cook tagliatelle pasta until al dente
Serve ragù sauce over pasta
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with a meaty ragù sauce served over tagliatelle pasta.

recipes.name: Pesto alla genovese
instructions: Combine basil leaves, pine nuts, and garlic in a food processor
Slowly add olive oil while blending
Stir in parmesan cheese
Serve over pasta or use as a dip or spread
recipes.description: A traditional Italian sauce made with fresh basil, pine nuts, garlic, and parmesan cheese.

name: Gennaro Contaldo
description: Gennaro Contaldo is an Italian chef and restaurateur. He is known for his traditional and rustic approach to Italian cuisine and has written several cookbooks and hosted multiple cooking shows.

recipes.name: Lasagne al forno
instructions: Cook lasagne pasta until al dente
Saute onion and garlic in olive oil
Add ground beef and cook until browned
Add tomato sauce and simmer for 30 minutes
Assemble lasagne layers with pasta, meat sauce, béchamel sauce, mozzarella cheese, and parmes an cheese
Bake in the oven at 375°F for 30-40 minutes
recipes.description: A classic Italian baked pasta dish made with layers of lasagne pasta, meat sauce, béchamel sauce, and cheese.

recipes.name: Sghetti carbonarapa
instructions: Cook spaghetti pasta until al dente
Cook guanciale or bacon in a pan until crispy
Combine egg yolks, pecorino romano cheese, and black pepper in a bowl
Drain pasta and add to pan with guanciale or bacon
Remove from heat and add egg mixture while stirring quickly
Serve immediately
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with spaghetti, crispy guanciale or bacon, and a creamy egg and cheese sauce.

recipes.name: Focaccia bread
instructions: Combine flour, yeast, and salt in a bowl
Add water and olive oil and mix until dough forms
Knead dough for 10 minutes
Place dough in a greased pan and let rise for 1 hour
Press rosemary into the top of the dough
Bake in the oven at 450°F for 20-25 minutes
recipes.description: A traditional Italian bread made with a simple dough, olive oil, and rosemary.

name: Lidia Bastianich
description: Lidia Bastianich is an Italian-American chef, restaurateur, and author. She has written several cookbooks and hosted multiple cooking shows on television.

recipes.name: Risotto alla milanese
instructions: Saute onion in butter in a large pan
Add arborio rice and cook for 2 minutes
Add chicken broth one cup at a time, stirring constantly
Add saffron and continue stirring and adding broth until rice is cooked and creamy
Stir in parmesan cheese before serving
recipes.description: A classic Italian rice dish made with arborio rice, chicken broth, saffron, and parmesan cheese.

recipes.name: Osso buco alla milanese
instructions: Saute onion, carrot, and celery in olive oil
Season veal shanks with salt and pepper and sear in the same pan
Add tomato paste and white wine
Add beef broth and simmer for 2 hours
Add garlic, lemon zest, and parsley to the pan before serving
recipes.description: A classic Italian meat dish made with tender veal shanks braised in a flavorful sauce of onion, carrot, celery, tomato paste, and white wine.

recipes.name: Tiramisu
instructions: Combine espresso and marsala wine in a bowl
Dip ladyfingers in the espresso mixture and layer in a pan
Combine mascarpone cheese, eggs, and sugar in a bowl
Spread half of the cheese mixture over the ladyfingers
Add another layer of ladyfingers and top with the remaining cheese mixture
Sprinkle cocoa powder over the top
Refrigerate for at least 2 hours before serving
recipes.description: A classic Italian dessert made with layers of espresso-soaked ladyfingers and a creamy mascarpone cheese filling, topped with cocoa powder.

name: Mario Batali
description: Mario Batali is an American chef, restaurateur, and media personality. He has written several cookbooks and hosted multiple cooking shows on television.

recipes.name: Spaghetti alla carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti pasta until al dente
Cook guanciale or pancetta in a pan until crispy
Combine egg yolks, pecorino romano cheese, and black pepper in a bowl
Drain pasta and add to pan with guanciale or pancetta
Remove from heat and add egg mixture while stirring quickly
Serve immediately
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with spaghetti, crispy guanciale or pancetta, and a creamy egg and cheese sauce.

recipes.name: Bruschetta
instructions: Slice bread and brush with olive oil
Grill or toast bread until crispy
Rub garlic on one side of the bread
Top bread with chopped tomatoes, garlic, and basil
Drizzle with olive oil and balsamic vinegar before serving
recipes.description: A classic Italian appetizer made with toasted bread topped with chopped tomatoes, garlic, and basil, drizzled with olive oil and balsamic vinegar.

recipes.name: Chicken cacciatore
instructions: Season chicken thighs with salt and pepper
Brown chicken in olive oil in a large pan
Remove chicken from pan and saute onion and red bell pepper in the same pan
Add garlic and rosemary and cook for 1 minute
Add tomato paste and white wine and cook for 2 minutes
Add canned tomatoes and return chicken to the pan
Simmer for 30-40 minutes until chicken is cooked through and sauce is thickened
recipes.description: A hearty Italian stew made with chicken thighs, onions, red bell peppers, and a flavorful tomato sauce.

recipes.name: Osso buco
instructions: Season veal shanks with salt and pepper and coat with flour
Brown shanks in olive oil in a large pan
Remove shanks from pan and saute onion, carrot, and celery in the same pan
Add garlic, rosemary, and bay leaves and cook for 1 minute
Add canned tomatoes and white wine and cook for 2 minutes
Return shanks to the pan and add chicken broth
Simmer for 2-3 hours until meat is falling off the bone
recipes.description: A classic Italian meat dish made with braised veal shanks in a flavorful tomato and vegetable sauce.

recipes.name: Fettuccine Alfredo
instructions: Cook fettuccine pasta according to package instructions
In a saucepan, heat heavy cream and butter until melted
Add parmesan cheese, salt, and black pepper and stir until cheese is melted and sauce is smooth
Add cooked pasta to the sauce and toss to coat
Serve with additional parmesan cheese and black pepper
recipes.description: A classic Italian pasta dish made with fettuccine pasta in a creamy parmesan cheese sauce.

recipes.name: Saltimbocca alla Romana
instructions: Place a slice of prosciutto and a sage leaf on each veal cutlet
Secure with toothpicks
Coat cutlets with flour
Heat butter in a large pan over medium-high heat
Add cutlets and cook until golden brown on both sides
Add white wine to the pan and cook for 2-3 minutes until sauce is reduced and thickened
recipes.description: A classic Roman dish made with veal cutlets wrapped in prosciutto and sage, cooked in a white wine sauce.

recipes.name: Torta della Nonna
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C
Line a baking dish with shortcrust pastry
In a saucepan, heat milk with sugar and lemon zest
Add flour and egg yolks and mix well
Pour mixture into the pastry shell
Sprinkle pine nuts on top of the filling
Bake for about 45 minutes until golden brown
recipes.description: A traditional Italian dessert made with shortcrust pastry and filled with a creamy lemon custard, topped with toasted pine nuts.

recipes.name: Tiramisu
instructions: In a bowl, mix mascarpone cheese, heavy cream, and sugar until smooth
Dip ladyfingers in espresso coffee and layer them in a serving dish
Spread a layer of the mascarpone mixture over the ladyfingers
Repeat layers of ladyfingers and mascarpone mixture
Cover and refrigerate for at least 2 hours
Sprinkle cocoa powder on top before serving
recipes.description: A classic Italian dessert made with layers of espresso-soaked ladyfingers and a creamy mascarpone cheese filling.

recipes.name: Pesto Genovese
instructions: In a food processor, combine basil leaves, pine nuts, garlic, and parmesan cheese
Pulse until finely chopped
Slowly pour in extra-virgin olive oil while pulsing
Add salt to taste
recipes.description: A classic Italian sauce made with fresh basil, pine nuts, garlic, and parmesan cheese, blended with extra-virgin olive oil to create a smooth and flavorful pesto sauce.

recipes.name: Risotto alla Milanese
instructions: In a large pot, saute onion in butter until translucent
Add arborio rice and cook for 1 minute
Add white wine and cook until evaporated
Add saffron and a ladle of chicken broth
Stir constantly and add more broth as needed
Cook for about 20-25 minutes until rice is tender and creamy
Stir in parmesan cheese before serving
recipes.description: A classic Italian rice dish made with arborio rice cooked in chicken broth with saffron, and finished with butter and parmesan cheese.
